raw_answer: Regarding patient 'BIII-8' from family 'Family B', the document states that the determination of the chromosomal phase for the p.D620N mutation was inconclusive for patient BIII-8. It further comments that to determine the chromosomal phase of families B (which includes BIII-8) and C, "detailed genetic analyses of other family members are needed in future studies."
question: Format answer for: Regarding patient 'BIII-8' from family 'Family B': Are there any additional comments about the study methodology?
context:
Based on the information in the document:

Regarding patient 'BIII-8' from family 'Family B', the document states that the determination of the chromosomal phase for the p.D620N mutation was inconclusive for patient BIII-8. It further comments that to determine the chromosomal phase of families B (which includes BIII-8) and C, "detailed genetic analyses of other family members are needed in future studies."
